dashboard.label: Welcome to the API App App

panel.title: Can I modify this app via the UI?

div.p: The answer is NO. This app is currently maintain by the github. If you modify this app via the UI, for instance, by creating a new dashboard or report, the changes will be overwritten by the deployment of the next version of this app.

panel.title: What should I do if I want to modify this app?

div.p: Any change to this app is very welcome but needs to go through the DDCOPS team team. Please contact the team to share your improvements.

panel.title: Who should I contact for any question about this app?

div.p: For any question about this app, please contact the Chris Prodger team

panel.title: How do I view the dashboards

div.p: Simply select the drop down menu under the heading "Dashboards" and select the dashboard you wish to view.
